name: SortOrder
desc: The orderings that you can perform sorts with.

items.name: init(from: Decoder)
items.desc: Creates a sort order by decoding from the decoder you specify.

items.name: func encode(to: Encoder)
items.desc: Encodes the sort order into the encoder you specify.

items.name: case forward
items.desc: The ordering that places the first item before the second when comparing two items using an ascending order.

items.name: case reverse
items.desc: The ordering that places the first item after the second when comparing two items using an ascending order.

items.name: static func == (SortOrder, SortOrder) -> Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether two sort orders are equal.

items.name: static func != (SortOrder, SortOrder) -> Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether two sort orders are unequal.

items.name: func hash(into: inout Hasher)
items.desc: Hashes the essential components of the sort order by feeding them into the specified hash function.

items.name: var hashValue: Int
items.desc: The hashed value of the sort order.
